lead_paragraph: Advocates of the change say it makes no sense to treat the teenagers the same way the state handles older defendants.

headline.print_headline: Louisiana May Raise Age for Juvenile Defendants
headline.main: Louisiana Juvenile Defendant Age May Be Raised to 17

snippet: Advocates of the change say it makes no sense to treat the teenagers the same way the state handles older defendants.
abstract: Louisiana follows growing trend in considering legislation that would include 17-year-old offenders in juvenile justice system; state is among nine that still try 17-year-olds as adults; experts cite range of reasons why policy is harmful.
